BBOB-2013 - Saturday, July 6th 2013, GECCO 2013, Amsterdam

Preliminary Schedule

(Please note that the schedule below is tentative and might be subject to changes)

Location: Room 04A00
8:30-10:20 (surrogates and linkage)
08:30 - 09:00 Nikolaus Hansen:
Introduction to Blackbox Optimization Benchmarking
09:00 - 09:35 Ilya Loshchilov:
BI-population CMA-ES Algorithms with Surrogate Models
and Line Searches Slides
09:35 - 10:10 László Pál:
Benchmarking a Multi Level Single Linkage Algorithm
with Improved Global and Local Phases Slides
10:10 - 10:20 Nikolaus Hansen:
Session Wrap-up
10:40-12:30 (an algorithmic jam-session)
10:40 - 10:45 Dimo Brockhoff:
Session Introduction Slides
10:45 - 11:05 Dimo Brockhoff:
Multiobjectivization with NSGA-II on the Noiseless BBOB
Testbed Slides
11:05 - 11:30 Costas Voglis:
Adapt-MEMPSODE: A Memetic Algorithm with Adaptive
Selection of Local Searches Slides
11:30 - 11:55 Babatunde Sawyerr:
Benchmarking Projection-Based Real Coded Genetic
Algorithm on BBOB-2013 Noiseless Function Testbed Slides
11:55 - 12:20 Neal Holtschulte:
Benchmarking Cellular Genetic Algorithms on the BBOB
Noiseless Testbed Slides
12:20 - 12:30 Dimo Brockhoff:
Session Wrap-up Slides
14:00-15:50 (expensive optimization)
14:00 - 14:05 Anne Auger:
Session Introduction
14:05 - 14:35 Anne Auger:
Benchmarking within the Expensive BBOB Setting: a
Case-Study on the local meta-model CMA-ES
14:35 - 15:00 Holger Hoos:
An evaluation of sequential model-based optimization
for expensive blackbox functions
15:00 - 15:25 Thomas Stützle:
Bounding the population size of IPOP-CMA-ES on the
Noiseless BBOB Testbed Slides
15:25 - 15:40 Nikolaus Hansen:
A Short Hands-On Tutorial of BBOB/COCO
15:40 - 15:50 Nikolaus Hansen:
Session Wrap-up
16:10-18:00 (wrap-up + panel)
16:10 - 16:25 Nikolaus Hansen:
A Brief Overview of Blackbox Optimization Benchmarking
16:25 - 16:40 Nikolaus Hansen:
Wrap-up of the BBOB-2013 Results
16:40 - 18:00 Mike Preuss (moderator):
panel discussion, panelists to be announced
